description: Become a Revenant and find the truth beyond revenge in this gothic fantasy RPG with stunning 3D battles! Boasting a story that blurs the lines between good and evil, a refined 3D battle system, and plenty of content to go around, this is one title not to be missed!

name: Preston Sterling
description: Preston Sterling and the Legend of Excalibur is the first episode of an adventure series that will transport you into the world of English myths and legends. Tackle tricky puzzles and enjoy an exciting story, lovable characters and stunning scenes and locations!

name: Super Destronaut
description: If you love retro games, this is for you! Get ready for some intense retro space shooting!

name: Free Balling
description: Why not testy it out?

name: Gear Gauntlet
description:
Gear Gauntlet is a fun but rage inducing 2D action arcade game from Drop Dead Interactive.

Test your patience through ever more punishing gauntlets while boosting, teleporting, reversing and rotating to survive. Use your reflexes to break through coloured barriers and earn your place on the...

name: Dreamals
description:
Having been summoned to a dream world, the three animals embark on an adventure to go back to their world.
Each animal can move only in one direction. Combine them wisely to find a path to the key.

name: Miko Mole
description: Miko Mole on PC features charismatic Miko with a passion for shiny gems, who is on a mission to become master thief by collecting enough diamonds on each level to open its exit to progress.

name: Mr. Pumpkin Adventure
description: Mr. Pumpkin's Adventure is a point-and-click puzzle game. The main character of this game is Mr. Pumpkin who lost his memories. During the adventure, you will help him solve all the puzzles, which will eventually unveil an evil plot.

name: MOP Operation Cleanup
description: You are MOP, a curious and unique model of robot. You have been engineered using simple parts with one single objective: To clean up a polluted environment. Explore five challenging worlds with 50 difficult missions full of pixel-perfect platforming fun.

name: Mahjong Deluxe 3
genre: Puzzle, Simulator, Strategy, Arcade, Card & Board Game
description: Mahjong Deluxe 3 is the newest entry in the popular Mahjong series of casual games produced by award-winning game developer EnsenaSoft.

name: Reptilian Rebellion
description: Stop the New World Order in this challenging game!

name: Defend Your Crypt
description: Defend Your Crypt is a strategy and puzzle game, in which we will have to avoid to lose our treasure by the tomb thieves. We, as the Pharaoh, can use different traps to defeat those damn ambitious humans who are profaning your tomb.

name: Dual Core
description: A vibrant, futuristic, twin-stick style, co-op, action adventure for 1-4 players. Battle through a world of explosive robotic mayhem - Add a generous helping of sci-fi intrigue, and a dash of RPG ELEMENTS!

name: Ace of Seafood
genre: Fighting, Shooter, Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Arcade
description: In the seas of the distant future, humans have all but disappeared. In your current, newly awakened state, you are no more than a piece of seafood. But you have also been blessed with talent in leading your allies in battle. Do whatever it takes to become the Ace of Seafood.

name: Land it Rocket
description: In this game your goal is to land your rocket safely, but watch out the world is full of danger like mines, lasers and turrets.

name: Star Sky 2
description: Explore the world around you, the magic that surrounds it.

name: Midnight
description:
In this golf-like game your task is to guide a little square shaped fairy, Midnight.
Use your mouse to launch Midnight, but watch out this world is full of danger.

name: Level 22: Gary's Misadventures
description: Gary is an office worker who overslept after a drunken night out in town. Here's where it gets tricky, because this isn't the first time Gary's been late for work, and he could be fired if he's spotted arriving at his desk after everyone else yet again. So he’ll have to prove his smartness and...

name: FullBlast
description: Blast your way through waves of alien invaders in this retro style shooter with modern visuals. Collect power ups, destroy the enemy ships and defeat the mega bosses in 12 action packed levels. On your own or with a friend in local co-op mode.

name: WinKings
description: WinKings is a 1-4 player 2D platformer game which throws you in fantasy Vikings era. Different and unique worlds, characters, enemies and weapons makes gameplay even engaging.

name: Vector Assault
description: Vector Assault is a fast paced twin stick shooter where you have to survive a onslaught of enemy attackers.

name: Rynn's Adventure: Trouble in the Enchanted Forest
description: Rynn’s Adventure is a 2D platformer game in which the player guides Rynn through a variety of environments teeming with magic and danger. The player will help Rynn combat the many enemies she encounters and outwit each of their fearsome generals. Rynn will eventually face off against the evil...

name: Blue-Collar Astronaut
description: Arcade space-physics meets your student loans. Blue-Collar Astronaut literally and figuratively explores upwards mobility on your way to the All-American Space-Dream.

name: The Rivers of Alice: Extended Version
description: The Rivers of Alice is a classic-style, emotional, graphic adventure set in a universe of puzzles and characters from the imagination of vetusta morla. Every time Alice falls asleep, she enters a fantasy world where the player must help her face her fears.

name: Asdivine Hearts
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
description: Restore the balance of light and shadow in the world!Beautiful hand-drawn visuals and a story of epic proportions bring Asdivine Hearts to the forefront of PC gaming! Travel alongside four companions and a cat in this fantasy 2D turn-based RPG!

name: Color Symphony 2
description: Color Symphony 2 is a puzzle action platformer that utilizes the ambiguity of color. Try to eliminate obstacles or find new paths by using color!

name: Draw a Stickman: Epic 2
description: Imagination is the key, as you enter a magical storybook full of mystery and wonder, unusual creatures, and enigmatic puzzles! Create your own original Stickman and then watch it come to life in DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2! Jump in to this action-packed adventure that allows for endless creativity!

name: GravBlocks
description: The abduction has begun! Can you meet the challenge or will you fall to these alien jerks?

name: Shapes of Gray
description: Shapes of Gray is a stripped-down action-arcade game about rapidly descending through a series of seconds-long levels, each one containing a unique combat-puzzle micro-challenge. Turn your enemies against each other to get the high score and unlock the secrets of a tiny enigmatic world!

name: Let's Sing 2016
description:
Let's Sing 2016 brings a brand new generation of karaoke to your PC!

Whether you're an experienced vocalist or a bathroom crooner, grab a mic and give it all you've got with the 35 available hits, including Bruno Mars, Meghan Trainor, Calvin Harris, Sam Smith, Avicii, Maroon 5, John Legend...

name: Run² and Die: Mimi's Revenge
description: Run Run and Die is a crazy and atypical challenging runner. You must help our little penguin hero escape a hellish complex through 24 levels filled with spikes, bombs, robots, traps, and more!

name: Dracula's Legacy
genre: Puzzle, Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Card & Board Game
description: Haunted by frightening dreams about her forgotten past, Isabella, along with her fiancé, were able to decipher one clue from the depths of her memory that leads them to an old ghost town.

name: Lucadian Chronicles
genre: Puzzle, Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Card & Board Game
description: Lucadian Chronicles is a strategy and card collecting game. Create teams that conform to color and cost limits while taking advantage of card synergies to progress through the full story mode of fight other players in league and draft modes.

name: Steel Rivals
description: Steel Rivals is a 2.5D fighting game for one or two players. Play tournament mode, survival mode or VS mode against the AI or another human player. Supports leaderboards and trading cards.

name: Six Sides of the World
description:
Six Sides of the World is a puzzle videogame that takes you into an intergalactic journey through different star systems riddled with brain-racking challenges.
Spatial orientation, logic and pure wit will be your weapons to go through the different cube shaped planetary systems. Each level will...

name: Twin Robots
description:
Twin Robots is a 2.5D platformer (the graphics are 3D but the gameplay is 2D) for 1 or 2 players.

In this unique game you have to escape - on your own or together with a friend - from a dangerous factory. Switch between two cute little robots and help out each other to overcome obstacles and solve...

name: Cosmophony
description: Cosmophony is a musical shooter designed for demanding gamers seeking an original and intense experience.

name: Breezeblox
description: Breezeblox is an addictive puzzle game where the objective is to reach the end cube without moving off the platform. Special cubes throughout the puzzles will trigger different actions on the platform to aid you with progressing. With 150 challenging puzzles to complete, your brain will be plenty...

name: Vektor Wars
description: A first-person cyber shooter tribute to classic Arcade blasters such as Battlezone, Berzerk & Robotron. All rendered in '80s 3D Vector-Vision' (TM).

name: Ice Cream Surfer
description: The evil Broccoli, irritated by the fact that kids hate vegetables and love ice creams, has created an army of vegetables to destroy the flavor galaxy. Only the Ice Cream Surfer with the help of his 4 super tasty friends can prevent that.

name: Inside My Radio
description: Can you beat the beat? Journey as a green LED mysteriously trapped inside a dying boombox and play the ultimate musical experience. In this rhythmic platform adventure where your every action needs to be right on the beat, bring electro, dub and disco music back to life!

name: Ping 1.5+
description: Ping 1.5+ is a new arcade style puzzle game with the objective of shooting the cube through over 100 stages to reach the orange.

name: Golf Story
description:
Play the story of a golfer, forced to give up all that he holds dear for one final shot at accomplishing his dream.

But all is not so simple in the world of golf. To best today's players you have to be able to keep up with them not just on the course, but also off it.

name: Joe's Diner
description: Somewhere along the venerable Route 7, in the middle of nowhere, you will find Joe’s Diner. The old Diner was built on the site of a former Indian cemetery. Amongst the buried, two rival chieftains are laid to rest; while alive each could not stand the other.

name: Dragon Fantasy: The Black Tome of Ice
description: Join Ogden and the heroes of Westeria in this classic JRPG epic, Dragon Fantasy: The Black Tome of Ice. Travel through the frozen wastelands of Tundaria and defeat oncoming hordes of demons and huge bosses that threaten the entire world of Dragon Fantasy.

name: Dreii
description: Experience the mesmerizing world of Dreii, the award-winning collaborative physics conundrum.

name: DubWars
description: DubWars is a music game that combines the mechanics of a top-down shooter with the power of Dubstep and Electronic music. Your weapons are synced to the music creating times of intense weapon load outs and calm moments where your survival skills are tested.

name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut
description: Shantae: Risky’s Revenge – Director’s Cut brings hair-whipping, belly-dancing to your PC! Play one of the most critically acclaimed handheld series of all time, now with brand new features!

name: Sketch Wars
description: Moba type game in retro 2D with the feel of DDR/parappa/Guitar hero. Starting SP first then heading to MP.

name: Just Dance 2018
description: No matter where you come from, how old you are, if you are a panda or a carrot: turn up the volume and get ready to unleash your inner dancer, because Just Dance 2018 brings out the dancer in everyone! The biggest music video game franchise of all time, with over 63 million units sold is coming...

name: Formation Z
description:
The player competes in a marathon continuous scrolling horizontal shoot-em-up game across land, sea, air and outer space. You can hold down the fire button for a burst of Charged fire, which is especially essential to defeat the bosses.

The player can hold down the Jump button to transform back...

name: Kaizou Choujin Schbibinman 3: Ikai no Princess
description: Tasuke and Kyapiko are spending a nice relaxing day at the beach, when suddenly a huge spaceship appears overhead! This can only mean one thing... another invasion! Tasuke and Kyapiko suit up and set out to stop it... or is it all just a gross misunderstanding?

name: Bonk 3: Bonk's Big Adventure
description: Aaagh! What's that Evil King drool doing back in the Dinosaur Kingdom?! Didn't Bonk get rid of him last time? Guess not, huh? Now it's up to our skull-splitting, head-butting, rock-smashing, monster-bashing prehistoric hero Bonk to put an end to Drool's dastardly deeds once and for all! Watch Bonk...

name: Moto Roader II
description: Abandoned future-lite style of the first game for a hard sci-fi look. In addition to a car, players can now race as tanks or hovercraft.

name: Final Soldier
description: On Earth in the 23rd century, a space time warp opens up over the Atlantic Ocean. From it comes an enormous invasion force analyzed to come from the 25th century. As Earth is attacked by the alien war machines, it is revealed that the culprits are identified as the Gader'el, a race of large...

name: Dragon Egg!
description: Dragon Egg! is a 2D platformer where you jump and attack enemies as you make your way through linear stages. You start off only being able to hit enemies up close with the dragon egg, but you can find fire orbs dropped by dead enemies. When you collect enough of them, the egg hatches and the dragon...

name: World Sports Competition
description:
Top Athletes Battle for Glory!

You create an athlete who runs, jumps, and throws! Aim for the world record...and never give up!

With 18 events to choose from...
With 6 categories, and a total of 18 exciting events, you'll have a wide choice to train for. Then go on to challenge Olympic Mode in...

name: Heisei Shin Onigashima: Zenpen
description:
Heisei Shin Onigashima: Zenpen is an Adventure game, developed by Pax Softonica and published by Nintendo, which was released in Japan in 1997.

It is a port of BS Shin Onigashima, a four-part broadcast game released for the Satellaview (a Super Famicom peripheral). This game (Zenpen) is composed...

name: Heisei Shin Onigashima: Kouhen
description:
Heisei Shin Onigashima: Kouhen is an Adventure game, developed by Pax Softonica and published by Nintendo, which was released in Japan in 1997.

It is a port of BS Shin Onigashima, a four-part broadcast game released for the Satellaview (a Super Famicom peripheral). This game is composed of the...

name: Dragon Buster
description: A 1984 arcade platformer with action RPG elements, Dragon Buster is notable as the first game to feature a double jump. It was also one of the first games to include a life meter (along with Flash Boy and Punch-Out), known as vitality in this game. The game featured side-scrolling platform gameplay...

name: Majin Tensei
description:
Majin Tensei is the first game in the Majin Tensei series and was released for the Super Famicom. Majin Tensei and its successors put a turn-based strategy twist on the usual Megami Tensei gameplay formula.

In the late 1990s, ethnic battles around the world result in a large amount of deaths and a...

name: Metal Slader Glory: Director's Cut
description: In the year 2062, Earth-based mechanic Tadashi and his girlfriend discover a mech from a war eight years prior with an ominous message stored in its memory suggesting Earth is in danger. They travel to nearby space stations and colonies to investigate its origins. Featuring redrawn graphics, scenes...

name: Heracles no Eikou III: Kamigami no Chinmoku
description:
Heracles no Eikou III: Kamigami no Chinmoku is the third installment of the series. Originally released for the Super Famicom, it was released on the Japanese Virtual Console in 2007 and a mobile phone in 2008 by G-Mode.

The game's plot and setting are loosely based around various episodes...

name: Majin Tensei II: Spiral Nemesis
description:
Majin Tensei II: Spiral Nemesis is the second game in the Majin Tensei series.

In Tokyo, 1996, a demonic invasion and coup d'état by a mysterious man transforms the city into the "demon capital". A group of people called Partisan stages a rebellion against the new government, but before long the...

name: Super Famicom Wars
description:
Super Famicom Wars is a war simulator produced by Nintendo for the Super Famicom. It was released via the Nintendo Power game service. It is the follow-up to the original Famicom Wars and a precursor to the Advance Wars series.

Super Famicom Wars features all 15 stages from the original 2-Players...

name: Vegas Stakes
description:
In this Casino simulator, you have decided to be a high roller. Followed by four friends, their main objective is to risk the Lady Luck and become a high roller in Las Vegas, place of luxurious and refined gambling houses.

With only $1000 in your pocket, feel free to explore five different casinos...

name: Battle Chopper
description: Players control a wacky fighter chopper name Mr. Heli, while shooting enemies, collecting power-ups, and defeating bosses to advance levels.

name: Ghosts 'n Goblins
description: Ghosts 'n Goblins is a platform game where the player controls a knight, named Sir Arthur, who must defeat zombies, ogres, demons, cyclops, dragons and other monsters in order to rescue Princess Prin Prin, who has been kidnapped by Satan, king of Demon World. Along the way the player can pick up...

name: The Legend of Kage
description:
The Legend of Kage is a port of the 1985 arcade game under the same name.

The player is armed with a kodachi shortsword and an unlimited amount of shuriken. Grabbing a crystal ball causes the player character's Kage's clothes to change to the next level in colour and thereby attain certain powers...

name: Color Zen
description: Color Zen is a new kind of puzzle game. With simple, intuitive controls, the game invites you to relax and immerse yourself. There are no points or penalties for failure; just an abstract world of color to move through at your own pace. So put on your headphones and find your way, with Color Zen.

name: Bomberman: Panic Bomber
description: It is a "falling blocks" puzzle game based on the Bomberman franchise. The goal of the game is essentially to cause your opponent to lose by causing their gameplay field to fill to the top with objects. You do this by causing chains of bombs to explode, sending useless rubble over to your...

name: Metro-Cross
description: Metro-Cross is a platform arcade game that was released by Namco in 1985. It runs upon Namco Pac-Land hardware (but with a video system like that used in Dragon Buster, modified to support a 2048-color palette). It uses a Motorola M6809 microprocessor, with a Hitachi HD63701 sub-microprocessor...

name: Trojan
description: The arcade version can be played by up to two players alternating. The game's controls consists of an eight-way joystick and two action buttons. Similarly to Kung-Fu Master or Rush'n Attack, the player jumps by holding the joystick upwards instead of having a dedicated jump button like other...

name: Seicross
description: The player rides a motorcycle-like craft, bumping other riders, collecting 'power' modules and shooting blue coins.

name: Mighty Bomb Jack
description: A platform game where the main character travels throughout various levels collecting bombs. The hero of the game, Jack, must make his way through 16 levels of a pyramid in order to defeat the demon Belzebut and rescue the royal Pamera family.Each level is split into two parts an action zone and a...

name: Star Luster
description: A first-person 3-D space shooter from Namco.

name: Wall Ball
description:
Wall Ball is a suspenseful, zigzag endlesss runner game with simple, yet appealing 3D graphics. The levels are randomly generated and promise a long lasting gaming experience.

Wall Ball was a game that was available for Wii U briefly.

name: Bio Miracle Bokutte Upa
description: Upa is the prince of a magical kingdom and the most recent in a line of brave fighters. One day, though, he broke an urn containing the spirit of Zai, an incredibly evil goatish demon who takes the life force of the kingdom's adults and kidnaps all the babies - except for Upa, who is given a...

name: Vs. Excitebike
description: Vs. Excitebike is a multiplayer version of the motorcross racing simulation game developed by Nintendo. It was released in the arcade shortly after the original Excitebike was released for the Famicom, partially in an attempt to create a demand for the home version in the United States.

name: Wrecking Crew
description: Wrecking Crew is a platform action game for one or two players. The player controls Mario (Player 2 as Luigi) working on a demolition site. The goal is to break down all of the stone walls on each stage. The game features a custom level maker, where players can make their own Wrecking Crew levels....

name: Hyper Sports 2
description: A mixed event of real power sports and tension-filled tests of coordination and concentration.

name: Konami's Soccer
description: Fast Action-True to Life-Soccer. Be part of KONAMI's winning team!

name: Parodius
description:
Parodius, also known as Parodius: The Octopus Saves the Earth, is the first title in the Parodius series.

The name itself is a portmanteau of "Gradius" and "Parody" and, eponymously, the game is a parody of the Gradius series of space-based horizontally scrolling shooters. The gameplay is very...

name: Ganbare Goemon!: Karakuri Douchuu
description: The peasants and commonfolk of Japan are suffering from corrupt officials and insane taxes! With no releif in sight, Ishikawa Goemon takes justice in his own hands, and starts a spree of robberies to steal back the wrongly taken money. Despite earning the title of "The Great Thief of Edo", Goemon's...

name: King's Knight
description: King's Knight is a fantasy-themed top-down shooter where four heroes have to unite to defeat a dragon and rescue a princess in despair. It was one of the first games published by Square Soft (now one-half of Square Enix). King's Knight is a variation on Konami's Knightmare which sold extremely...

name: Sky Jaguar
description:
The sudden materialization on earth of an invading space fleet - followed by the appearance of enemy battle fortresses floating in the sky!!
Mobilize the sky jaguars - earth's defensive fleet - to meet the enemy aliens!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - The Master Trials
description:
DLC pack 1 cannot be purchased outside of the expansion pass. This first DLC pack for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the wild doesn't include any story additions but does include new side quests, armour, features and a new trial.
Master mode is a new game mode which makes all monsters stronger and...

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - The Champions' Ballad
description:
DLC pack 2 cannot be purchased outside of the expansion pass.

The Champion's Ballad. Following the guidance of an unseen voice, Link encounters a new test: the Divine Beast Tamer's Trial. Take hold of the One-Hit Obliterator to clear out monster encampments, discover new shrines, conquer a huge...

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Expansion Pass
description:
The expansion pass is the only way to purchase the DLC packs for the game.

The pass includes 2 DLC packs: The Master Trials and the Champion's Ballad.

DLC Pack 1: The Master Trials.
Master mode, a new game mode which makes all monsters stronger adds powerful new enemies.
The Trial of the Sword is...

name: Langrisser: Hikari no Matsuei
description:
An improved version of the original Langrisser game.

It has improved graphics and sounds as well as animated cinematics.

name: Kaizou Choujin Schbibinman
description: A crazy, yet genius professor named "Doc" sends two of his brand new and most skilled cyborgs against an army of evil machines that have taken over the city. With the help of their special suits and powerful energy-swords, they fight waves of enemies of increasing strength, as well as bigger and...

name: Digital Champ
description: Take to the ring and fight against strangely familiar looking opponents in this first-person boxing game. Block and dodge with the D-Pad while using the buttons to punch with either left or right fists. Hold the button down and you get a more powerful hit, but it requires more timing and accuracy...

name: Battle Lode Runner
description: Once an ancient arcade game, and with a previous version on the PC Engine by Pack In Video, Hudson Soft have taken the addictive gameplay of Lode Runner and given the graphics a complete face lift. The puzzle-based action in Lode Runner is simple: You are presented with a side-view...

name: Bomberman '93
description:
Tension, strategy, action, excitement - Bomberman's back!

You can now battle against up to four computer-controlled maniacs by yourself for the ultimate five bomberman mode.
Choose from seven exciting new stages with loads of new power-up items like werps, conveyer belts, revolving doors and even...

name: Shockman
genre: Shooter, Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up
description: It's been two years since Arnold and Sonya were made into Shockmen. A message from the professor to return to their bodies has them head to his laboratory, but they are ambushed by a mysterious enemy along the way. After narrowly defeating the enemy, they catch a TV news flash announcing the Ryo...

name: Power Golf
description: Power Golf is a golf video game released by Hudson Soft for the TurboGrafx-16 on August 29, 1989 as one of the system's launch titles. Played using primarily an overhead view of each hole, Power Golf features stroke and match play, and a competition mode that supports up to three players.

name: Double Dungeons
description: Summoned by the King, you are the last hope of a once peaceful land. Journey deep within the earth on your quest to destroy a strange, unnatural force. With new "split screen" action you and a partner can work together to uncover the mysteries of the eerie underground labyrinth and its evil...

name: Chew-Man-Fu
description: Chew-Man-Fu has gone too far! His evil curse deprives you, (and everyone else), of your beloved egg rolls and fried rice. To break his spell, roll 4 magic balls through a maze to matching colored squares. Sound easy? Hah! Chew's whole zoo is out to stop you. Prickly porcupines, wily penguins, rowdy...

name: Victory Run
description: Strap on this red turbo-charged beauty and punch it. Barrel through the streets of night-time Paris. Lean into the rolling countryside curves. Sweat the hot Sahara straightaway. The famous Paris to Dakar Road Rally tests driving skills, reaction time and your knowledge of the needs of your machine...

name: Blazing Lazers
description:
Blazing Lazers is a top-down shooter featuring 9 levels of varied and fast-paced action. The story here is the usual save-the-world variety. You must pilot your ship against 8 super-weapons and ultimately destroy the menace once and for all.

The power-up system in Blazing Lazers deserves special...

name: China Warrior
description: Boss Kara and his evil horde has captured the entire kungfu province. You are summoned - You obediently go knowing full any of Kara's bullies could no doubt put out your lights. You must face them and their specialties one by one .. then finally Kara himself. A sip of a sacred tea releases hidden...

name: Air Zonk
description: The powered-up Zonk gathers his friends to form Team Cool, and they set out to stop King Drool’s plan to conquer the world. Choose from 3 levels of difficulty and 3 types of Friend Modes. Shoot King Drool's cyber robots and avoid their attacks while collecting the Air Bones to unleash a variety of...

name: Color Cubes
description:
In the last few years puzzle cubes have been baffling millions of people. Color
Cubes is a cube that is made up of twenty-seven smaller cubes (called cubies) of
six different colors. The goal of Color Cubes is to unscramble the faces of the
cube so that each face is made up of a solid color.

name: Famicom Bunko: Hajimari no Mori
description: Hajimari no Mori is an Adventure game, developed by Pax Softonica and published by Nintendo, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Wrecking Crew '98
description: Wrecking Crew '98 is a Japan-only puzzle video game released for the Super Famicom. It is the sequel to the Nintendo Entertainment System game Wrecking Crew. The game takes on a more competitive approach, featuring puzzle-versus elements akin to games like Tetris and Puyo Puyo. Such additions...

name: Ganbare Goemon 3: Shishijuurokubee no Karakuri Manjigatame
description: Third title in the Ganbare Goemon series of platform/adventure games which cast you as the heroic Goemon as he attempts to save feudal Japan from all sorts of wacky evildoers. This time around, a time-travelling machine threatens all of Japan and thus Goemon and co. must jump into the future to...

name: Ganbare Goemon 2: Kiteretsu Shogun McGuiness
description: As you may have guessed from the number 2 in the title, this is the second SNES game in the popular blend of the adventure and jump and run genres which is the Goemon series. Again, you (and your partner, in 2 player mode) control Goemon, his friend Ebisu-Maru and, new to the bunch, robot Sasuke,...

name: Rival Turf!
genre: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: Rival Turf is a cyber-punk comic-book style beat 'em up inspired by the likes of Streets of Rage and Final Fight.

name: Pop'n Twinbee: Rainbow Bell Adventures
description:
You play as either Twinbee, Gwinbee or Winbee. Cooperative play is also available. In this mode the second player takes control over one of the two characters left. Either way your task is to find and defeat the evil Dr. Warmon who tries to enslave the islands of Dunburi.

To deal with the many...

name: Natsume Championship Wrestling
description:
Over 50 different moves: Cobra Twist, Pyle Driver, Backdrop, Brain Buster, DDT, Kitchen Sink, Rally Art, Avalance Hold, Guillotine Drop, Shoulder Through, Sleeper Hold, Kneedrop, Reverse Shrimp Hold, Powerbomb and much more...

5 Play Selections: Championship Tournament, Round Robin, Championship...

name: Metal Marines
description: Metal Marines is an isometric strategy game. Controlling one side of a conflict, the player must wage a campaign across several islands to defeat Zorgeuf and his lieutenants. The player controls logistics of the base to ensure that there are the necessary assets to wage war. On each map, the player...

name: Kunio's Dodgeball Time, C'mon Guys!
description:
Okay, listen up! Nekketsu High Dodgeball Club has proven themselves once before on the world arena, but now, the stakes are higher! We got to go out there again and show why Nekketsu High is the greatest team in the world. Lead us to victory, Kunio!

Kunio-Kun no Dodge Ball Dayo Zennin Shuugo! is...

name: Super Ninja Boy
description:
Super Ninja Boy is an action RPG for one or two players. In a two player game, each player controls either Jack or Ryu. In a one player game, only Jack appears. A second player may join at any time by visiting a convenience store.

The game contains familiar role-playing elements such as equipping...

name: The Ignition Factor
description: The Ignition Factor is a 2D adventure where the player controls a firefighter through emergency situations in differing locations. Each level consists of multiple rooms, areas, or building floors where players can possibly explore, extinguish fires, and rescue people. Most levels dictate a specific...

name: Brawl Brothers
genre: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: Released in 1992 for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System, Brawl Brothers is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game by Jaleco, serving as the sequel to Rival Turf! and preceding The Peace Keepers in 1993. Set in Bayside City, where people are vanishing amidst rumors of sinister human cloning...

name: Watch Dogs: Complete Edition
description:
Experience Watch_Dogs - the phenomenon of 2014 - with the biggest edition ever!
As Aiden Pearce, a brilliant hacker, turn Chicago into the ultimate weapon in your quest for revenge.
In this Complete Edition, including the game + Season Pass, access a new game mode, weapons, outfits and missions and...

name: Watch Dogs: Vigilante Edition
description:
The Watch_Dogs Vigilante Edition is dedicated to hard core fans who'd like to embody the hacker vigilante in real life!

The Vigilante Edition includes;
- Aiden’s Baseball Cap and Mask
- Soundtrack
- Single player mission: Palace pack

name: Dreamals: Dream Quest

name: Word Puzzles by Powgi
description: A collection of 6 word puzzle games for 3DS and Wii U. It features hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles and supports every amiibo.

name: Totem Topple
description: In Totem Topple you have to drop heads down on top of a totem pole while weird spiny things idly float into it as they try to knock it down.

name: Perpetual Blast
description: Perpetual Blast for the Wii U

name: The Quiet Collection
description: A collection of Nostatic Software's pixelart adventure games.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Atsumete - Tomodachi Daisakusen!
description: Taiko no Tatsujin: Atsumete - Tomodachi Daisakusen! is the third Taiko videogame for the Wii U home console, and the second console game to be released in occasion of the 15th Anniversary of the Taiko no Tatsujin franchise; as such, the Game + Tatacon bundle of this title also includes a set of...

name: Yo-kai Watch Dance: Just Dance Special Edition
description: A collaboration between Level-5 and Ubisoft, the game is a Yo-kai Watch-themed version of the Just Dance games.

name: Gunman Clive HD Collection
description: Gunman Clive HD Collection is a compilation of two side-scrolling platform shooters, Gunman Clive and Gunman Clive 2, presented in high definition. Players progress through short stages featuring platforming, shooting, and boss fights, with a hand-drawn visual style and minimal story elements.

name: Cube Life: Island Survival
description: A block building open-world survival game originally for the Wii U, later ported to a variety of systems.

name: Temple of Yog
description: A Wii U-exclusive roguelike which displays the regular world on the TV and a shadow world on the GamePad screen.

name: amiibo Tap: Nintendo's Greatest Bits
description: Tap any amiibo to unlock brief gameplay highlights of classic Nintendo games. A free title for Wii U.

name: Horror Stories
description: A co-op horror game.

name: Bizerta: Silent Evil
description: A horror adventure currently in development for Wii U.

name: Yakuman Houou
description: Yakuman Houou is a mahjong game that supports both Wii U and Nintendo 3DS, so you can play on the big screen of your TV at home or on the Nintendo 3DS on the go. This game only released in Japan.

name: Know Your Friends
description: A Wii U-exclusive quiz/partygame from Ubisoft Paris. The game is completely finished and currently being held by Ubisoft until they feel the Wii U install base is big enough.

name: Fujiko F. Fujio Characters Daishuugou! SF Dotabata Party!!
description: Celebrate the 80th birthday of one of manga's most prolific writers.

name: Jett Tailfin Racers
description: A mobile racer brought to the Wii U.

name: Meme Run
description: An infinite runner for the Nintendo Wii U.

name: Trashmania Trilogy
description: Trashmania Trilogy was to remake the three games in the Trashmania series for Wii U, but was canceled.

name: Kamen Rider SummonRide
description: Collect special Kamen Rider figurines and place them upon a portal to summon them in this fast-paced brawler.

name: Super Robo Mouse
description: Robo the mouse has to collect Titanium Cheese to unlock the gates and escape the maze it is trapped in.

name: XType Plus
description: An endless boss battle bullet hell shooter. Also features a more frantic "plus" mode as well as online leaderboards with included replay sharing.

name: Blok Drop x Twisted Fusion
description: A crossover collaboration between Leuvision and RCMADIAX to create a game that blends Blok Drop U's puzzles in Twisted Fusion's world including enemies that have to be defeated with the Bloks utilizing gravity.

name: Percy's Predicament
description: Percy the Penguin is trapped in a mysterious clear orb and must rely on players to guide him around.

name: Gaiabreaker
description: In this scrolling shooter, take control of a hi-tech gunship and blast your way through six different stages to protect Earth from an invading menace.

name: Poker Dice Solitaire Future
description: Poker Dice Solitaire Future is a game similar to the dice game Kismet, for Wii U.

name: Animal Crossing Plaza
description: A free application on Wii U that allows players to hang out in the plaza with their favorite villagers and import their photos from Animal Crossing: New Leaf save them to a gallery and share them on the Wii U Miiverse. The service ended on January 1st 2015.

name: My Jurassic Farm
description: My Jurassic Farm is a farming simulator with dinosaurs.

name: Chromophore: The Two Brothers Director's Cut
description: A completely reprogrammed version of Two Brothers on a new engine and with brand new combat.

name: GetClose
description: Two players. One controller. Two players hold the same Wii U GamePad and compete for the crown in this frantic game.

name: Fit Music for Wii U
description: Fit Music for Wii U is a music/rhythm-based fitness game utilizing the Wii Balance Board, Wii Remote and Wii U GamePad.

name: Monster Hunter Frontier G3
description: Season 3 of Monster Hunter Frontier G.

name: Monster Hunter Frontier G5
description: A new version of the Monster Hunter MMO spin-off, Fronter G5.

name: Wind-up Knight 2
description: Wind-Up Knight 2 continues the adventures of the clockwork hero.

name: Cocoto Magic Circus 2
description: Cocoto Magic Circus 2 is a shooting gallery game for Wii U.

name: Buddy & Me
description: Buddy & Me is an endless runner set in a boy's dream world.

name: Twisted Fusion
description: An open-world platformer exclusively for Wii U by one-man developer Leuvision. Twisted Fusion has a day/night and weather cycle that affects the environment and enemy behavior.

name: Game Boy Wars Advance 1+2
description: Game Boy Wars Advance 1+2 is a bundle with the first two Advance Wars games contained on a single cartridge, released only in Japan.

name: Wrecking Balls Arena DX
description: Wrecking Balls Arena DX was to be an upgraded and expanded version of Wrecking Balls Arena. In October 2014 it was confirmed to have been scrapped in favor of other projects.

name: Sync
description: First Person Adventure game from Dead Pixel Entertainment exclusively for Wii U. The players finds themselves in a mysterious sci-fi world where they have to find data stations to ultimately destroy the dangerous A.I. called Sync.

name: Razor Global Domination Pro Tour
description: A new freestyle scooter game for the new console trio developed by Renegade Kid in partnership with Razor licensee Scarab Entertainment. The game was supposedly canceled due to publisher issues.

name: Wallaby!! Usagi no Kuni no Kangaroo Race
description: In this game the player bets on races. The twist is, the racers are wallabies. They also have rabbits in their pouches. The game takes place in a world largely inhabited by the said rabbits, but there are other animals, such as koalas who serve as bookmakers. The game also features managerial...

name: Blok Drop U
description: Blok Drop U is a puzzle game for Wii U build on the Nintendo Web Framework with the Construct 2 Engine. Players have to land the red blocks on the ground while destroying the gray blocks. Additional levels will be added as free DLC.

name: Kamen Rider: Battride War II
description: Kamen Rider: Battride War II was released on June 26, 2014, and it features characters from the most recent TV series Kamen Rider Gaim as well as story scenarios based on the various Kamen Rider films, including the Movie Wars series. As with the original game, a limited edition version with the...

name: Hello Kitty Kruisers with Sanrio Friends
description: Hello Kitty Kruisers is a family-friendly racing game that brings Hello Kitty fansan action-packed adventure. On land, over water, and through air, race your way to victory as Hello Kitty and her Sanrio friends!

name: Cult County
description: Renegade Kid's new episodic Horror-FPS originally planned for the Nintendo 3DS eShop. On April 2, 2014 Renegade Kid announced the game was evolved into a console game and went to Kickstarter while the 3DS version has been canceled. The game will be made even if the Kickstarter fails but it will...

name: Another Castle
description: Another Castle is a Kickstarter-funded platformer mixed with roguelike elements such as randomly generated levels and character persistence over multiple playthroughs. The game was canceled in July 2015.

name: Days of Dawn
description: Turn-based RPG with unique magic system from Bumblebee.

name: Cryamore
description: Action-RPG from NostalgiCO, successfully kickstarted on February 26, 2013. ATLUS would be publishing the game in Summer 2016.

name: Fade Into Darkness
description: An experimental first person adventure game, heavily driven by 3D-positional audio design.

name: Oliver & Spike: Dimension Jumpers
description: Dimension hop through this 3D adventure/puzzle/platformer described by the developers as Ratchet & Clank meets Zelda meets Uncharted.

name: Hunter's Trophy 2: Europa
description: A hunting game from Bigben Interactive.

name: Hiryuu no Ken II: Dragon no Tsubasa
Wheel of Fortune
description: THQ brings one of America's favorite game shows back to consoles in 2012 for PS3, Xbox 360, and Wii U.

name: Dream Pinball 3D II
description:
The cancelled sequel to Dream Pinball 3D targeting the next generation of hardware of the original.

As well as new tables, it was going to introduce a clever slow-motion function that enables the player to master that particularly difficult skill shot and features a full list of varied mini-games...

name: Sacrilegium
description: A survival horror game from the creators of Two Worlds.

name: Block Zombies!
description: Block Zombies! is a voxel based dual-stick zombie shooter for the Xbox Live Arcade and Wii U.

name: My Exotic Farm
description: Get exotic with parrots and stuff on your very own DSiWare farm.

name: The Mysterious Murasame Castle
description:
Restore peace to a land that has been overridden by evil!

One stormy night in feudal Japan, a mysterious force begins to take control over Murasame Castle and its lands. Each lord in four neighboring castles has taken possession of a dark sphere of power, allowing them to summon ninja armies and...

name: Rainbow Snake
description:
Rainbow snake is a beautiful classic game.
Eating food, snake painted in different colors.
Collect a colorful snake and avoid the green walls. Over time, the snake is gaining speed!

name: Lode Runner
description: This updated take on the original Lode Runner is essentially an entirely new game, but it keeps the core of Douglas Smith's original ideas intact.

name: Break In
description: Break In is a pool simulator. The game features six different billiard games, including 9 Ball, Rotation, and Carom. It also features different modes: Simulation, Action, and Technique. Up to four players may play.

name: Cube Life: Pixel Action Heroes

name: Gotouchi Tetsudou: Gotouchi Chara to Nihon Zenkoku no Tabi
description: Gotouchi Tetsudou: Gotouchi Chara to Nihon Zenkoku no Tabi is a board game developed by Grounding Inc. and published by Bandai Namco Games.

name: Rubik's Cube
description: The official Rubik's Cube game is here! Play anywhere, anytime on the most authentic digital representation of the Rubik's Cube available. Rubik's Cube is a 3-D combination puzzle invented in 1974 by Hungarian sculptor and professor of architecture Ernő Rubik.

name: Famicom Wars
description: Famicom Wars is a Japanese-only video game for the Famicom (the Japanese name for the NES). It was designed by Nintendo R&D1 and programmed by Intelligent Systems and published by Nintendo. It spawned many sequels, five of which were released in America. It is the first game in the Nintendo Wars...

name: Downtown Nekketsu March Super-Awesome Field Day!
description:
This prequel to the game known in the West as Crash'n the Boys: Street Challenge sees Kunio-kun competing in four not-so-traditional athletic events.

The game was originally released as Downtown Nekketsu Koushinkyoku: Soreyuke Daiundoukai, but has since been localized as Downtown Nekketsu March...

name: Ganbare Goemon 2
description: The second game in Konami's Ganbare Goemon series of bizarre action/brawler games based on historical figure Ishikawa Goemon. It was only released in Japan on January 4th 1989 on the Famicom.

name: Dungeon Explorer
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description:
Dungeon Explorer is a multiplayer action/role-playing game where up to five players can play at the same time.

You, brave soldier, are the last hope of a once-peaceful Oddesia. Yours is a strange world full of magic, hidden dangers and potions. But you have powerful friends. Use them to recover...

name: Tennis
description:
Tennis is a sports game developed and released by Nintendo for the NES. In North America and Europe, Tennis was one of 18 launch games for the NES. A Game Boy version was also released.

The game features single-player and two-player modes for singles and doubles matches, with either competitive or...

name: Star Wars: Battle of the Sith Lords
description: Battle of the Sith Lords (internally codenamed Damage and given the working title Maul) was the tagline for a Star Wars video game once in development by Red Fly Studio. The game was canceled on June 24, 2011. Red Fly employees linked the game's cancellation to Star Wars creator George Lucas'...

name: SpaceRoads
description: An HD remake of a classic. Hours of fun gameplay and more content to be added soon.

name: Koi DX
description: KOI reflects a tranquil and mesmerizing experience as you embark on an introspective journey through the lens of a lone koi fish separated from its owner and is the last hope for purifying waters polluted by mankind. It’s up to you to turn the tide and guide the koi through eight artfully rendered...

name: Axiom Verge: Multiverse Edition
description:
Includes: 
- Copy of the game disc/cartridge. 
- Deluxe booklet with developer’s commentary and art. 
- Double-sided poster with the world map and weapons/items in the game. 
- Exclusive making-of documentary. 
 
The Nintendo Switch version also includes the games soundtrack but costs an extra 10$...

name: Necromancer
description:
Necromancer, originally released as Jaseiken Necromancer is a fantasy role-playing video game. It was released first only in Japan for the PC Engine, but saw a later release for the Wii and Wii U Virtual Consoles, the latter being released worldwide.

The Wii U release was when the game received...

name: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero - Friends to the End
description:
"The final piece of the Shantae: Half-Genie Hero storyline is here!

When Shantae falls prey to dark magic, it’s up to Shantae's BFFs Sky, Bolo, and Rottytops to save her from a Nightmare Realm of her own imagining! Conquer remixed locales (and new challenge levels) using Bolo’s grapple claw, Sky’s...

name: Underground
description: Underground is a unique game that is a potential training tool for surgeons disguised as a puzzle game in which players guide a robot through dangerous mines.

name: Final Fantasy III
description:
Final Fantasy III is the third FF game for the Famicom. The turn-based battle engine has been improved: if the enemy is defeated, the next character will automatically switch to another enemy, and not hit the air, like in the previous two games.

The game itself is, like the previous games, a...

name: Breakout Defense 2
description: A breakout game where you face off against the computer opponent through 20 levels.

name: Swap Fire
description: Swap Fire's a shooter with a literal twist. Shooting other players rips a hole in spacetime thus swapping your locations. You'll have to commit to losing in order to win in Drop Zone, manage spacetime to dominate the map in Control Point, master the art of teleportation to go for the gold in...

name: Maze
description: Maze is a First Person Puzzle Adventure game. Embark on the journey of a young hero from Mazadon, in search of the all knowing Oracle!

name: Schlag den Star: Das Spiel
description: After three successful Schlag den Raab video games, Schlag den Star is now going into the next round. You and up to three of your friends compete in 25 challenging original games from the TV show. Show everyone that you not only have the greatest general knowledge! You also need dexterity, skill...

name: Kiki Trick
description: Kiki Trick is best described as a sound-based collection of mini-games. It has an eclectic art design fusing a blend of paper cut outs, hand drawn visuals, and digital photography and video featuring Japanese actors.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Wii U Version
Taiko no Tatsujin: Tokumori!
description: A new Taiko Drum Master game for Wii U with 100 new songs.

name: Monster Hunter Frontier G Genuine
description: Season 4 of Monster Hunter Frontier G.

name: Monster Hunter Frontier Z
description:
The next installment of Monster Hunter Frontier, Zenith Species and Extreme Style makes its first debut here.

Monster Hunter Frontier Online, later renamed Monster Hunter Frontier Z, was a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) for Microsoft Windows, the first spin-off in the...

name: Wii U Panorama View
description: Panorama View allows you to look at things using the Wii U GamePad.

name: Hanjuku Hero
description:
The first game in the series, released in 1988 for Famicom. It was re-released on the Virtual Console in 2007 for the Wii, in 2013 for the Nintendo 3DS and in April 2014 for the Wii U.

Hanjuku Hero is a real-time strategy RPG game. A king used the power of a mysterious egg to unify a continent....

name: Spin the Bottle: Bumpie's Party
description: The classic party game reimagined for the Wii U. You don't even need the TV. Up to 8 players sit around the GamePad and spin a virtual bottle. Challenges are carried out with Wii Remotes.

description: Tsuppari Oozumou is a sumo wrestling game. The goal is to wrestle the opponent out of the ring. The opponents get harder as the game progresses. Different moves can be performed depending on button and directional combinations.

name: Turtle Tale
description: Turtle Tale is an action adventure game by Saturnine Games available for the Nintendo eShop

name: Double Dragon III: The Sacred Stones
description: Billy, Jimmy, and the whole Double Dragon gang fight for the Sacred Stones to save in the world in yet another beat-em-up.

name: Medarot G: Kuwagata Version
description:
Medarot G is a 2D action game released in 2002 for the Game Boy Advance. It was the first Medarot action game to be released in Japan.

In the Kuwagata version the player starts with Adolphin. The game mainly features characters and Medarots from Medarot 5, but some major characters from Medarot 2...

name: Mario's Super Picross
description: Mario's Super Picross is the first sequel to the Game Boy game, Mario's Picross, and can be played on the Super Famicom. After the commercial failure of Mario's Picross in the West, this sequel was released only in Japan. The game plays much the same way as the first, except Wario appears in it and...

name: Act It Out! A Game of Charades
description: This game from Snap Finger Click aims to take care of all the setup and score keeping for Charades, leaving the players free to focus on embarrassing themselves!

name: Dragon Quest X: Mezameshi Itsutsu no Shuzoku Online

name: Aqua TV
description: Aqua TV is a stunning, fully customisable, virtual aquarium. Choose a tank then change the floor, walls, decoration - and of course fish - to make the aquarium YOU want!

name: Super Mario Advance

Based heavily on the Super Mario All-Stars version of the game, it also features an updated version of the original...

name: Game & Watch Gallery 4
description: Relive the birth of handheld gaming with over a dozen classic Game & Watch games. Picture-perfect versions reproduce all the fast-paced action of the original games, and new modern versions bring these games into the 21st century with improved graphics, sound, and game play!

name: Pinball
description:
Guide the ball around the board collecting points, but be careful not to run out of time or land in the hazard zone. Endless fun for everyone!

Pinball was released for the Wii U in 2017.

description: Hurry up! Time flies! Hunt as many birds as possible before the time runs out. With several different types of objectives, you're given a unique and challenging variety from start to finish.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XII with Power Up Kit
description:
"Romance of the Three Kingdoms 12 with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms 12," which was released in 2012 as the 12th game in the series.

The stage is set. Create the story.
Throughout the course of Chinese history, upset victories, like the Battle of Guandu and...

name: Skylanders: SuperChargers - Portal Owner's Pack
description: Kick your adventure into overdrive! The Skylanders SuperChargers Portal Owner’s Pack includes the full video game, works with any Portal of Power from the Skylanders series and includes Instant Spitfire and Instant Hot Streak. Expand your gameplay experience with over 40 Skylanders and vehicles to...

name: Brick Breaker
description: Brick Breaker, the classic arcade game, is back with a breathtaking new version. Its explosive gameplay - unique and timeless - is filled with surprises. Sharpen your reflexes and precision to overcome the hundred different levels that await you. Collect bonuses, avoid traps and shoot your way to...

description:
Pic-a-Pix are exciting logic puzzles that form whimsical pixel-art pictures when solved. Challenging, deductive and artistic, this original Japanese invention offers the ultimate mix of logic, art and fun while providing solvers with many hours of mentally stimulating entertainment.

Pic-a-Pix are...

name: Hyrule Warriors: Treasure Box
description:
The Treasure Box of Hyrule Warriors includes the following content:

Official Art Book collection
Tri-Force Table clock
“Courage” costume set (3 types)
“Wisdom” costume set (3 types)
“Power” costume set (2 types)
Link’s scarf
Treasure chest accessory case (with sound)

name: Tokyo Mirage Sessions #FE: Special Edition
description:
Tokyo Mirage Sessions #FE is a crossover role-playing video game based on the two companies' Shin Megami Tensei and Fire Emblem series, respectively.

The Special Edition of Tokyo Mirage Sessions #FE comes in a "special" box and includes:
- Download codes for all five sets of planned downloadable...

name: Tokyo Mirage Sessions #FE: Fortissimo Edition
description:
The Fortissimo Edition contains :

- A physical Game.
- An Artbook: A 5x8 inch color artbook featuring character art, environments, weapons, enemies, and developer commentary.
- A Soundtrack CD
- Codes to redeem on the Nintendo eShop for five sets of DLC items, including costume sets and "support...

name: LEGO City Undercover: Limited Edition
description:
The Wii U exclusive LEGO City Undercover, developed by TT Games, available in a limited-edition software bundle which includes both the retail game and a LEGO minifigure of Chase McCain: the multi-talented cop whose many skills will be required to save the day.

This Edition was also included in...

name: Just Dance 2016: Gold Edition
description: The world's best-selling dance game is back!

name: Panel de Pon
description:
A tile matching puzzle game for the Super Famicom, the first in the Puzzle League series. It was later modified to feature Yoshi and Mario related characters to be released in the western regions, under the name of "Tetris Attack".
It was also a downloadable game for the Satellaview that was...

name: Grumpy Reaper
description: Grumpy Reaper is an arcade-style game that includes elements of skill in different playing modes.

name: Geom
description: Geom is a puzzle game with timed challenges. There are three modes each with its own set of rules.

name: Heptrix
description: Like the famous falling blocks game but with seven blocks each piece.

name: Gravity+

description: In I C Redd, you travel along an endless tunnel - dodging oncoming obstacles. Turn left or right quickly to avoid getting hit earning points along the way. Share your progress with family and friends to see who can achieve the highest score! Endless fun for everyone!

name: Molly Maggot
description: Become the maggot.

name: Mon Premier Karaoke

name: Minecraft: Wii U Edition
description: Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures.

name: Near Earth Objects
description: Shoot rocks. Get POW. Survive!

name: My First Songs

description: You get to play 153 different hands of poker at once. You won't get bored. Your whole screen be filled. Don't worry, it is super easy to manage all your poker hands at once and it is designed to be like Las Vegas style video poker.

description: Team up with 4 friends to hack and slash your way through eight worlds in this retro arcade adventure. Power up by exploring a secret-filled 8bit world. name: 99Seconds
description: The saga continues after 99Bullets.

description: Pikmin just got a bit more perfect! Whether you are a Pikmin fan or have yet to be bewitched by its charms, NEW PLAY CONTROL! Pikmin now makes full use of the Wii Remote's point-and-select capability, which will delight anyone who enjoys a real-time strategy adventure.

name: New Play Control! Pikmin 2
description: Captain Olimar has returned to marshall new colors of Pikmin in a wild, open-ended adventure—and this time, he's brought an assistant. description: The highly rated Nintendo GameCube game, created by the same team that developed Super Mario Galaxy, returns with enhanced motion controls and new surprises.

name: My Style Studio: Notebook

description: Wash, colour, cut, curl and style - make any hair style you want!

description: Wash, color, cut, curl and style, make any hair style you want.

name: My Farm

description: The saga continues after 99Bullets. Now your problem isn't the number of bullets, rather the amount of time.

name: Shadow Archery

Power-ups will aid you in your survival against the ever spawning creatures of the realm! Arrows are limited, so make...

All was fine and well till these annoying Tomeverme showed up and decided to wreck the magical library! It's up to Emmy to do away with these nuisances before Master shows...

name: Angry Birds Star Wars HD
description: Angry Birds Star Wars is a video game that is part of the Angry Birds series. It serves as an adaptation of the original trilogy of the Star Wars series.

name: Uncharted Waters: New Horizons
description: Uncharted Waters: New Horizons is an action-strategy game set in the Age of Exploration, the golden era of European global exploration in the 16th Century.

But we do know there will be (minor) destruction and property damage along the way. In this world, encounter familiar and new enemies that will...

name: Kirby's Star Stacker
description: Kirby's Star Stacker is the official English title given to a puzzle Kirby game that was originally released on Japan's Super Famicom system on February 1, 1998. It is a remake of Kirby's Star Stacker, which is known in Japan under exactly the same name as the remake. The game was originally...

name: El Silla: Arcade Edition
description: Help El Silla hit every character he encounters with a chair.

name: Azure Snake
description: Azure Snake is a beautiful snake in the world of light.

description: This is a disc that combines the two games New Super Mario Bros. U and New Super Luigi U.

Metal Sonic in his unique transforming vehicle + handling mods
Outrun Bay track, based on the iconic arcade game, + time trials
Exclusive...

name: Space Intervention
description: Save our galaxy from the invasion of an alien race.

name: Space Hunted: The Lost Levels
description:
You are Jade Hunter, an intergalactic treasure hunter. While traveling past an uncharted planet, your ship was shot down. Now Jade is an intruder, an alien, on this uncharted planet, and is being hunted down. Your mission is to survive and escape the planet! 
 
This is a more challenging version of...

name: Regina & Mac
description:
Regina & Mac is a 3D platformer that stands in the tradition of the classics from the late 90s and offers a fair challenge even for genre aficionados.
Join the macaw Regina and the tyrannosaurus Mac on their adventure as they try to escape a lifeless research lab. The only way out? To find the...

name: Killer Freaks From Outer Space
description:
Killer Freaks from Outer Space is a cancelled game project from Ubisoft Montpellier that was changed to better fit the Wii U platform after being shown at E3 201.
It was re-revealed as ZombiU at E3 2012.

"In 2012, the world is going down the drain, fast...

Reams of alien ships have crashed into...

name: Super Mario 64: Shindou Pak Taiou Version
description: This version of Super Mario 64, originally released only in Japan, is an enhancement over the International release of the game, as it retains all of the glitch fixes as well as graphical and sound changes. The main differences of this version are the Rumble Pak support, some small glitch fixes,...

name: Shmup Collection
description:
The Shoot’em up 2020 compilation not to be missed!
Fans of the genre or neophytes, you will easily get your hands on these 3 nervous shooters that are Satazius Next, Armed 7 DX and Wolflame, produced by the Japanese studio Astro Port.
Which are a mess of enemies and just as many weapons to get the...

name: Taxi Journey
description:
Taxi Journey is an original puzzle/adventure game in a universe that combines charm, humor and mystery. It takes inspiration from games such as Limbo or Machinarium but comes up with a very unique universe and original gameplay features.

Taxi Journey was a unsuccessful Kickstarter project by Lexis...

name: Sonic Lost World: Yoshi's Island Zone
description: Free DLC for the Wii U version of Sonic Lost World, featuring a Yoshi's Island themed stage.

name: Sonic Lost World: The Legend of Zelda Zone
description: The Legend of Zelda Zone is a DLC level in Sonic Lost World that is exclusive to the Wii U version of the game. It was released as a free download on the Nintendo eShop on March 27, 2014.

name: Star Fox Zero + Star Fox Guard

description:

Dragon Quest X: Mezameshi Itsutsu no Shuzoku Online (Version 1) Rise of the Five Tribes Online)
Dragon Quest X: Nemureru Yuusha to Michibiki no Meiyuu Online (Version 2) (The Sleeping Hero and the Guiding Sworn Friend Online)
Dragon Quest X: Inishie no Ryuu no...

name: Dragon Quest X: 5,000-Nen no Tabiji Harukanaru Kyuuri he Online
description: The third major expansion for Dragon Quest X online, known among the community as Version 4.

name: Dragon Quest X: Ibara no Miko to Horobi no Kami Online
description: The fourth major expansion for Dragon Quest X Online, known as Version 5.

name: Challenger
description: Play as Challenger, a brave archeologist whose mission is to rescue a princess who's been kidnapped by a secret evil organization. The game offers four different types of adventures in four different ways to play, starting with a runaway train battle, exploring a vast island, and facing off against...

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. Pack
genre: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: Based on the second season of the Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. television series, this DLC adds a brand-new level, eleven characters, and an additional vehicle to your Marvel's Avengers.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Classic Captain Marvel Pack
genre: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: Based on the classic Captain Marvel comics, this DLC adds a brand-new level, eight characters, and an additional vehicle to LEGO Marvel's Avengers.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Classic Black Panther Pack
genre: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: Based on the classic Black Panther comics, this DLC adds a brand-new level, nine characters, and an additional vehicle to LEGO Marvel's Avengers.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: All-New, All-Different Doctor Strange Pack
genre: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: Based on the All-New, All-Different Doctor Strange comics, this pack adds eight new characters (Baron Mordo, Clea, Doctor Strange (ANAD), Doctor Voodoo, Dormammu, Jennifer Kale, Mindless One and Night Nurse) and one new level (All-New, All-Different Doctor Strange).

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: The Masters of Evil Pack
genre: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description: Based on Avengers #6 from 1963, this DLC adds a brand-new level and eleven characters to LEGO Marvel's Avengers.

name: Word Search by Powgi
description:
Word Search by Powgi includes more than 300 puzzles to keep you – and your friends – puzzling for hours!

Up to four can play! Connect extra controllers to solve the puzzle as a team – or compete for the best score.

name: Thomas Was Alone: Benjamin's Flight
description: In this Thomas Was Alone level pack, discover the tale of Benjamin and his father's incredible invention. Meet a new companion and a familiar face in the events leading up to Thomas' emergence.

name: Donkey Kong
description: Donkey Kong has kidnapped Pauline, and it is up to Mario, the fearless carpenter, to come to her rescue. Throwing fate to the wind, Mario tries desperately to climb the labyrinth of structural beams from the top of which Donkey Kong taunts him. Help our hero ascend the metal structure by dodging an...

name: Monster Hunter Frontier G6
description: Season 6 of Monster Hunter Frontier G series.

name: Commander Keen in Keen Dreams: Definitive Edition
description: Commander Keen is back. In the modernised Definitive Edition of the lost episode "Keen Dream", Keen has to fend off a nasty nightmare about evil vegetables. The Definitive Edition features full widescreen support, twelve all-new levels - doubling the length over the 1990 original - and a full music...

name: Regina & Mac World
description: Regina and Mac are back in an all new, 2D adventure. On a quest to help their new friend Macbat (from Macbat 64) to find the purpose in his life, the dinosaur and the parrot jump, run, slide and dash through 100 level filled with secrets.

name: Crystorld
description: Get Crystal! The goal of this game is to get a crystal somewhere on the stage using jumps and dashes. More than 120 stages! There are two modes: normal and hard. 4-player local multiplayer!

name: Break in
description: Gather up to four players for an authentic game of pool right in your own home! Choose from six billiards games, such as 9 Ball, Rotation, and Carom (a game played without pockets). Use Simulation mode to calculate the perfect shot, or select Action mode and check out what went wrong with your...

name: Dying is Dangerous
description: "Dying is Dangerous" is a memory game set in a horrific and dangerous world. Observe and remember the traps or... die !

name: Mountain Peak Battle Mess
description: High, high in the clouds, there is a small mountain. There are fierce battles. You are a warrior who must survive as long as possible. Everything depends on you.

name: Seasonal Assistant
description: You are Elfie, an impromptu alter ego of an assistant to a well known spellcaster. Armed with festive holiday themed spells (and a cute outfit to match), you're on a quest to get the ultimate gift for your special friend! It's time to deck some halls through winter wonder land levels and defeat...

name: Snowball
description: Snowball's fellow baby seals have been captured by hunters, and he needs your help to rescue them! Guide Snowball through different mazes, dodging hunters and collecting snowballs as you go. Collect enough snowballs to open the path to the next level. After every three mazes, take the fight to the...

name: Famicom Tantei Club Part II: Ushiro ni Tatsu Shoujo
description: A Super Famicom remake of Famicom Tantei Club Part II: Ushiro ni Tatsu Shoujo, with new graphics and music.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Second Wind
description: The Legend of Zelda: Second Wind is a fan expansion/mod of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. This expansion adds new maps, new enemies, armor, weapons and game mechanics to the original game.

name: Resident Evil: Revelations
description: Resident Evil: Revelations is a remaster of the 3DS game with high quality HD visuals, enhanced lighting effects and an immersive sound experience.

name: Akumajou Densetsu
description: Akumajou Densetsu is the Japanese version of Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse. This version has many differences in gameplay and level layout, making the overall experience easier than its western counterpart.

name: Assassin's Creed III: The Battle Hardened Pack
description: The Battle Hardened Pack extends the Assassin’s Creed III multiplayer experience with three new playable characters and maps, plus awesome bonus items! Become the influential Governor, the resilient Highlander, or the fearsome Coyote Man.

name: Sutte Hakkun
description: This version was released for use with the Nintendo Power cartridge, and included all the levels designed by game creators (which wasn't possible to do with the 8MB Satellaview Memory Pak). It was afterwards released as a Super Famicom standard cartridge and also for the japanese Wii and Wii U...

name: Assassin's Creed III: Tyranny of King Washington - The Infamy
description: In the first episode of The Tyranny of King Washington, the American Revolution is over but the true battle is just beginning. In The Infamy, George Washington, blinded by a thirst for unlimited power, has declared himself king.

name: Dragon Quest X: Tensei no Eiyuu-tachi Online
description:
The fifth major expansion for Dragon Quest X, known as Version 6.

To play with Dragon Quest X Heroes of the Heavenly Stars Online, the player must have Dragon Quest X Awakening of the Five Tribes, The Sleeping Hero and the Guided Allies, Lore of the Ancient Dragon, The 5000 Year Voyage to a...

name: Mighty No. 9: Ray Expansion
description: A mysterious robot named RAY has appeared and our hero Beck has been tasked with infiltrating an abandoned lab to search for her. Discover the origins of RAY and join her in her quest for answers.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3 was originally released for the Game Boy Advance and had physical expansion in the form of a collection of e-Reader cards. When the game was re-released on the Wii U Virtual Console, it included the full game with all of the level expansions found in the...

description: Clu Clu Land D was originally released simply as Clu Clu Land (though the name in the title screen is Clu Clu Land: Welcome to New Clu Clu Land) for the Famicom Disk System, and is a port of VS. Clu Clu Land. The game would later be playable with the localized name as an unlockable in Animal...

name: Heisei Shin Onigashima
description: Heisei Shin Onigashima is an episodical game released for the Super Famicom. It is a port of the Satellaview 4-part broadcast game BS Shin Onigashima, which in turn is a remake of the original Famicom Mukashi Banashi: Shin Onigashima. It was released first as a Nintendo Power digital distribution...

description:
Famicom Tantei Club: Kieta Koukeisha - Zengohen is the version of the Famicom Disk System game ported to later consoles, released first on the Japanese Wii Virtual Console.

This version of the game has both disks of the adventure (Zenpen and Kouhen), making it playable without the need to switch...

name: Rockman 2: Dr. Wily no Nazo
description: Rockman 2: Dr. Wily no Nazo is the original Japanese version of Mega Man 2. The Japanese version of the game doesn't have difficulty settings, having its difficulty the same as the Difficult setting of the Western version, thus, being more difficult in comparison with the Normal mode of Mega Man 2.

name: Mario Bros.
description:
The first port of Mario Bros. was developed by Nintendo for the Famicom and later released in American under the Arcade Classics series. It follows most of the features of the arcade game, and adds a difficulty setting.
This version would be the most re-released version in future consoles.

description: LEGO Dimensions: Legolas Fun Pack adds The Lord of the Rings' Legolas character to the LEGO Dimensions multiverse. The pack includes a buildable Legolas figure and Arrow Launcher vehicle, which can be placed on the Toy Pad to use in-game. Players can utilize Legolas's archery, acrobatics, and pole...

name: LEGO Dimensions: Gollum Fun Pack
description: Keep watch over the multiverse from the shadows with Gollum from The Lord of the Rings! Put Gollum on the Lego Toy Pad and transport him into the game to activate his special Boomerang, Mini Access, Acrobat and Dive abilities as he overcomes challenges and takes on enemies. description: Bring the Wizarding World to life in the Lego Dimensions Multiverse with Harry Potter and Lord Voldemort. Build and place the iconic duo on the Lego Toy Pad and launch them into the Multiverse. Unlock the Harry Potter Adventure World and bring the fight between good and evil into the Battle Arena....

name: LEGO Dimensions: Supergirl Polybag
description: A Polybag exclusive to the Starter Pack Playstation 4 version of Lego Dimensions, although the character will work across all platforms.

description: Venture through the night with Excalibur Batman! Build the Dark Knight and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him into the Lego Dimensions multiverse. description: Dig your way through the multiverse as DC Comics villain Bane! Build powerful Bane and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place him on the LEGO Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game and activate his Hazard Protection, Big Transform and Super Strength abilities to...
