description:
Continue your wizarding adventures in LEGO Dimensions with your very own Hermione Granger Fun Pack.
Build and place Hermione on the LEGO Toy Pad to bring her to life in the game where she can cast Wingardium Leviosa to levitate objects and Lumos to light up dark places.
Unlock the Adventure World...

name: LEGO Dimensions: Tina Goldstein Fun Pack
Life Force
description: Life Force is an action-packed shooter where there are six levels which alternate between side and vertical scrolling, each of them ending with a powerful guardian. Throughout the game, destroying certain enemies will release power ups which can be used to equip your ship with more powerful...

name: New Super Mario Bros. Mii
description: New Super Mario Bros. Mii was an "experience" tech demo shown at E3 2011 for the Wii U. It is based on New Super Mario Bros. Wii and contains new levels, as well as the option for players to use their Miis. This demo was meant to demonstrate the "Off-TV Play" capability of the Wii U, allowing the...

name: Donkey Kong Jr.
description: Donkey Kong Jr. for the Nintendo Entertainment System is one of the most recognizable ports of the original arcade game, being re-released and ported many times.

name: Donkey Kong 3
description: The NES port of Donkey Kong 3 is the most re-released version, being part of the e-Reader ports and of the Virtual Consoles.

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Mewtwo
description: The Psychic-type Pokémon Mewtwo makes its grand entrance! Make it Mega Evolve into Mega Mewtwo Y in its Final Smash, and then use Psystrike to blow away the opposition! Mewtwo was released for Club Nintendo members who registered their copies of Super Smash Bros. for Wii U and Super Smash Bros. for...

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Lucas
description: Lucas, the boy with psychic powers, returns to Super Smash Bros.! Keep enemies where you want them with his tricky skills and Rope Snake, and then deliver a winning blow with his up smash attack!

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Roy
description: Smash Bros. veteran Roy joins the battle from Super Smash Bros. Melee.

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Ryu
description: Ryu joins the world of Super Smash Bros. to continue his quest to be the strongest, and he even brought his own stage! Enter his famous button combos to power up his special moves!

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Corrin
description: Corrin, the draconic main character of Fire Emblem Fates, joins the Smash roster! Use the Yato sword and the powers of the First Dragons to take control of the field!

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Bayonetta
description: Bayonetta joins the fight to show off her Bullet Arts and Witch Time! A new stage is available, as well!

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Cloud
description: Cloud makes his Super Smash Bros. debut and brings the Midgar stage with him, complete with Summons!

name: Contra
description: Contra is a run-and-gun shooter video game developed and published by Konami. It is one of the many ports of the homonymous arcade game. The MSX2 version was later re-released for the Wii and Wii U Virtual Console.

name: Captain U
description: Welcome to this new, yet familiar, universe. You are now known as Captain U and you are here to locate the missing princess! Equipped with this universe's legendary weapon, the PowerPad, you will utilize your unique powers to find the princess and save the universe! Adventure through 9 challenging...

name: Super Food Frenzy
description: SUPER Food Frenzy is an action party game which you can play with up to four friends. Slide through the pan to avoid your opponents while trying to jump on them to kick them out.

name: Medarot G: Kabuto Version
description:
Medarot G is a 2D action game released in 2002 for the Game Boy Advance. It was the first Medarot action game to be released in Japan.

In the Kabuto version the player starts with Dichotom. The game mainly features characters and Medarots from Medarot 5, but some major characters from Medarot 2...

name: Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story
description:
Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story is the original Japanese version of the game released in other regions under the title of Nintendo World Cup. The Japanese version is part of the Kunio-kun/Nekketsu High series.

The game was originally released under the title of Nekketsu Koukou...

name: Downtown Nekketsu Story
description:
Downtown Nekketsu Story is the original version of the game known as River City Ransom.

The game was first released as Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, but has since been localized as Downtown Nekketsu Story.

name: Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun
description:
Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun is the home console port of Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun for the Family Computer.

The game was first released as Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun, but has since been localized under the new title of Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun.

name: Salamander
description: The MSX port of Salamander (沙羅曼蛇, Saramanda) is significantly different from the original and any other ports. New to this port is a graphical introduction that introduces human pilots for each ship, as well as names for each stage. The levels are notably longer than the arcade original, and the...

name: Rayman Legends
description: Originally thought as an exclusive title, Rayman Legends used the Wii U Gamepad for some functionalities. After going multiplatform, the Wii U and PlayStation Vita versions of Rayman Legends gave the ability to control Murphy in certain stages through touch controls. This interaction was removed...

name: Bubble Bobble
description: Bubble Bobble is a platform game, with each level being a single screen. The enemies must be cleared from a level to go to the next one. With one player controlling Bub and the other controlling Bob, the player can jump and collect items for points (such as fruit). The real power Bub and Bob have...

name: Ship of Harkinian
description: Ship of Harkinian, also known as The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time PC Port, is a mod (which requires the original game to compile) of the famous Nintendo 64 game, made using the open-source code by the Nintendo 64 Decompilation Project, just like the Super Mario 64 PC Port. This mod adds quality...

name: Pad of Time
description: It's time to play a 2.5D retro-style platformer... With a twist!

name: Alice in Wonderland
description: Discover unique and original characters in the amazing world of Wonderland.

name: Pinball Arcade
description:
Pinball Arcade by FarSight Studios features exact recreations of the all-time greatest pinball tables from Williams, Bally, Stern Pinball, and Gottlieb together in one game.

Every flipper, bumper, sound effect, and display pixel has been painstakingly emulated in astonishing detail.

name: Double Dragon
genre: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Arcade
description:
The NES version of Double Dragon takes a wide range of liberties with the interpretation. The entire graphical style is more in line with Technōs’ Kunio-kun series, with characters that go for exaggerated expression rather than gritty realism.

The biggest change, however, was reserved for the...

name: Double Dragon II: The Revenge
genre: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Arcade
description: Technōs created once again a vastly different experience with Double Dragon II on the NES. The experience system was dropped, but the moveset still underwent a few changes. The elbow attack and turning jump kick are gone, but with the standard kick directed backwards they seemed a bit redundant...

name: Detana!! TwinBee
description: The PC-Engine port of Bells & Whistles originally released only in Japan before coming to the West through the Wii Virtual Console service, under its original Japanese title.

name: Mass Effect: Genesis 2
description: Mass Effect: Genesis 2 is an "interactive backstory comic". It is an updated version of Mass Effect: Genesis, which was originally created for Mass Effect 2. Genesis 2 fills the role of Mass Effect and Mass Effect 2 for new players to the series, introducing them to the story of the first two games...

name: Final Fight
genre: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Arcade
description: A port of Final Fight for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System was released as a launch title for the platform in Japan in 1990 and later in North America in 1991 and then in the PAL region in 1992. The SNES port removed the two-player co-op option, the Industrial Area level and playable...

name: Cloudy Super Mario Bros. U
description: A mod of New Super Mario Bros U featuring 30 new levels and brand new tilesets.

name: Dragon Quest X: Nemureru Yuusha to Michibiki no Meiyuu Online
description: The first expansion for Dragon Quest X Online, known as Version 2.

name: Dragon Quest X: Inishie no Ryuu no Denshou Online
description: The second expansion for Dragon Quest X Online, known as Version 3.

name: Cloudy Super Mario Bros. U 2
description: Sequel to the New Super Mario Bros. U mod Cloudy SMBU. This mod features 40+ levels, many new tilesets and an original soundtrack composed of brand new tracks and remixes.

name: Pac-Man
description: The NES port of the arcade classic.

name: Adventures of Lolo
description: This game is different from the Western game Adventures of Lolo, being the sixth game in the Eggerland series.

name: Adventures of Lolo II
description: In this game, players take to the mountains and towers scattered across a vast field and use their wits and reflexes to solve puzzles.

name: Swords & Soldiers
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Strategy, Indie, Arcade
description: The funniest action-strategy game you'll ever play! Command an army of Vikings in their quest to create the ultimate BBQ sauce, lead the Aztecs in defence of the Holy Pepper, and build an array of explosive Chinese toys!

name: Brave Tank Hero
description: Save Paradise City from invading forces in this tank game from Natsum on Wii U.

name: Electronic Super Joy
genre: Shooter, Music, Platform, Adventure, Indie, Arcade
description:
Electronic Super Joy is a brutally hard platformer set in a world of pulse-pounding electronic music.

This Wii U port is censored from the original to remove some suggesting content.

name: Job the Leprechaun
description: Help Job the Leprechaun to rescue his friend Eri in this retro style Platformer Game on Wii U.

name: Ninja Gaiden
genre: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Arcade
description: Experience the original adventure of Ryu Hayabusa, the shadow warrior, in this acclaimed and challenging action-platformer from the NES era!

name: R-Type
description: R-Type is Hudson Soft's port of R-Type for TurboGrafx-16. Unlike the Japanese two part release for PC Engine (R-Type I and R-Type II) it was released as one complete game.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Multiplayer
description: A mod which adds the ability to play in local multiplayer in Breath of the Wild.

name: Abyss
description:
An Expanded version of the original on Nintendo DSi.
Abyss is an arcade-adventure game telling the story of a teenager who sets off on a dangerous and obstacle-filled journey. Take part in this thrilling adventure, explore 21 different levels, from the gloomy streets of ód to the infernal dungeons....

name: Gradius
description: The NES port of Gradius.

name: Kung-Fu Heroes
description: The NES port of the Arcade game Chinese Hero.

name: Doki Doki Tegami Relay
description:
The classic art of passing notes in class.
Japan exclusive for a limited time.

name: Michiko Jump!
description:
Leap off of a seesaw!

Japan exclusive; available for a limited time.

name: Dig Dug
description: The Famicom port of Dig Dug. It was originally only released in Japan, being first released overseas via the Wii Virtual Console.

name: Super Ghouls 'n Ghosts
description:
The Game Boy Advance version of Super Ghouls 'n Ghosts includes an "Arrange" Mode not present in the original.
The Arrange Mode lacks a second run, so the Goddess' Bracelet can be obtained anytime when Arthur is equipped with the Golden Armor. Both modes contain a new Save feature, letting the...

name: Gyakuten Saiban
description:
Gyakuten Saiban is a visual novel adventure game developed by Capcom Production Studio 4 and published by Capcom. It was released in 2001 for the Game Boy Advance.

The story follows Phoenix Wright, a rookie defense attorney who attempts to have his clients declared "not guilty". Among other...

name: Gyakuten Saiban 2
description: Gyakuten Saiban 2 (original version of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Justice for All) is a visual novel adventure video game. It was originally released for the Game Boy Advance in 2002 in Japan. The game is the second entry in the Ace Attorney series, following Gyakuten Saiban (Phoenix Wright:...

name: Gyakuten Saiban 3
description: The third installment of the Gyakuten Saiban/Ace Attorney series of text adventure video games. It is the last installment in the Gyakuten Saiban Trilogy. In addition to featuring three episodes in which Phoenix Wright faces off against a mysterious new prosecutor named Godot, the game also...

name: Minecraft: Update Aquatic
description: Minecraft: Update Aquatic is a major update to Minecraft that focuses on revamping the oceans in the game, adding many new aquatic mobs, blocks, items, and structures.

name: Zelda's Ballad
description: Zelda's Ballad is a mod of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild! Everything has been completely changed: the character, the voice, the animations, the hair physics, the dialogues, the different costumes and armors, the menu, the icons, etc.

name: Splatoon: Version 2.0.0
description:
Version 2.0.0 is a major update to Splatoon, which took place on 6 August 2015 at 02:00 UTC. Some hotly-anticipated features made their debut, such as additional game modes, new weapons and new gear.

Changes:

Major content update:
New modes: Squad Battle and Private Battle.
Progression changes:...

name: Super Smash Bros. Deluxe
description: This Smash Wii U modpack has a real and authentic look, all the extra skins make sense as alts of the character they go on, fighters from one series are on fighters from the same series. In addition to a bunch of extra alternate costumes/characters, almost all of the Omega stages have been replaced...

name: New Super Mario Bros. U but the Floor is Lava
description: Every Level from Acorn Plains to Superstar Road but the floor is lava.

name: Super Mario 3D World and Nintendo Land Bundle
CTGP-Universe
description: CTGP-Universe is a Mario Kart 8 modpack featuring custom tracks, custom Grand Prix icons, text edits, a new boot screen, new music for tracks and new menu screens.

name: Minecraft: N7 Mash-up
description: Shape the fate of your Minecraft galaxy with this amazing mash-up, which includes thirty-six character skins, bespoke game textures, themed menus, a dedicated world filled with iconic locations, and an original soundtrack compilation to set the mood.

name: Minecraft: Dragonborn Mash-up
description: The Dragonborn meets Minecraft in a clash of epic proportions. Build your own worlds in the land of Tamriel and experience adventure with many of its most iconic characters. Fus Ro Dah!

name: Minecraft: Festive Mash-up
description: Wander through a winter wonderland! World, textures, skins, and more!

name: Minecraft: Greek Mythology Mash-up
description: Build a pantheon fit for the gods, trap the Minotaur in an elaborate maze, or set sail for adventures across the sea. The world is your square oyster!

name: Minecraft: Halloween Mash-up
description: Dress suitably spookily and prepare for the ultimate Minecraft Halloween thrill ride!

name: Minecraft: Chinese Mythology Mash-up
description: Journey through epic terrain and find enlightenment in this mythical Mash-up!

name: Minecraft: Super Mario Mash-up
description: The Super Mario Mash-Up Pack comes to Minecraft! Get new skins, a Super Mario-themed pre-made world and a set of Super Mario-themed music and item textures!

name: Star Fox Armada
description: Star Fox Armada is a cancelled game in the Star Fox series. The game was meant to be a continuation of Star Fox 64 for the Wii U.

name: Minecraft: Vault-Tec Mash-up
description: Welcome to the wasteland! Crack open the Vault containing 44 unique skins, custom textures, re-skinned mobs, a special post-apocalyptic map, an original soundtrack compilation, and a Pip-Boy-inspired UI.

name: Minecraft: Adventure Time Mash-up
description: Adventure Time, c'mon grab your tools, we're going to a very blocky world. With Jake the Dog and Finn the Human, and a bundle of their friends, it's Adventure Time... Mash-up! Featured in this pack: your favorite Adventure Time characters, the Land of Ooo, a bespoke texture set, BMO-themed UI, and...

description: Are you heroic enough to enter the Great Hall, Valhalla? Find out in the Norse Mythology Mash-up! Compose your own grand saga as you voyage through the 9 realms, from the treetops of Yggdrasil, down into the mines of Svartalfheim and the depths of Hel!

name: Minecraft: Pirates of the Caribbean Mash-up
description: Take what you can. Give nothing back! Join Jack and his crew in the Pirates of the Caribbean Mash-up, featuring many of your favorite rogues and rascals. Plot a course from Tortuga to Shipwreck Cove and all the way down to Davy Jones’ Locker. This is the day you will always remember as the day you...

name: Minecraft: The Nightmare Before Christmas Mash-up
description:
A nightmare? Before Christmas?
With thousands of blocks over there
And more redstone than I can bear?
Looks scary, but also fun!
Could it be I got my wish?
Should I play, or should I run?
A Christmas pack so nightmarish!

name: Minecraft: Egyptian Mythology Mash-up
description: Will you survive the perils of the Pyramids? Journey through the Valley of the Kings, dodge deadly traps, and explore the ancient tombs below! The fourth pack in the Mythology series, this Egyptian-themed Mash-up comes with textures fit for a Pharaoh, legendary mobs, a pantheon of skins, and an...

name: Sentou Danchi
description:
"Survivors stranded on an unknown planet. Dangerous creatures roam this planet at night.
Fight to protect your escape ship to survive and return to your home planet. Survivors enter the capsule and drift to the planet.
If you use the blocks that have fallen on the planet to make their homes, they...

name: Mother
description: The original Japanese version of EarthBound Beginnings, released only in Japan for the Famicom, had some gameplay, story and level layout differences from the later Western port. This original version was never released outside of Japan.

name: FIFA Soccer 13
description: A port of FIFA 13 with added features.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Randomizer
description:
This Randomizer will randomize items you will find in chests and be given by NPCs. Randomized enemy drops are included too. Additionally, warping via both the Sheikah Slate as well as going inside and outside of shrines has the chance of getting randomized too.

It was taken down from GameBanana by...

name: Madden NFL 13
description: Nintendo Wii U port of Madden NFL 13.

name: Street Fighter Alpha 2
description: The SNES port of Street Fighter Alpha 2 had to lower the quality of graphics and audio because of the power of the machine. This version also have loading times when entering matches while sounds are loaded onto the sound chip. Unlike the PlayStation and Saturn versions, the only secret characters...

description:
An online multiplayer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
Its development started due to the streamer PointCrow offering U$10,000 for a modder to make an online multiplayer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild with some conditions, like being the first to stream and that the...

name: The Legend of Zelda: Relics of the Past
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild which changes the game to be more challenging by enhancing the map and enemy locations, being akin to an unofficial expansion for the game.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Islands Expansion

name: Minecraft: Marvel Spider-Man Skin Pack
description: The pack contained characters from Spider-Man

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Throwback Expansion

name: Minecraft: Moana Character Pack

description: Minecraft: Doctor Who Skin Pack - Volume I is a skin pack for Minecraft that contains 57 Doctor Who-themed skins.

name: Minecraft: Plastic Texture Pack
description: Make your worlds simple, colorful, and vibrant!

name: Super Mario Evolution
description: Super Mario Evolution is a cancelled mod for New Super Mario Bros. U. This mod aimed to make for an interesting and fun experience.

name: Super Mario Moonlite World
description:
This mod is a compilation of levels and other assets originally intended for 'Super Mario Moonlight World', thus making it a 'Lite' version, this includes:
- 15 Moonlit levels each more unique than the last
- Dozens of custom tilesets
- An almost entirely original soundtrack to fit the nighttime...

name: Pac-Land
description: NES/Famicom port of Pac-Land.

name: Salamander
description: Salamander was ported to the Family Computer in Japan in 1987. Instead of being a direct port of Salamander, elements were taken from the original Salamander and the Japanese Life Force re-release, and some elements, such as levels and bosses, were removed to make way for new content. Most of the...

name: Salamander
description: A version for the PC Engine was released on December 6, 1991. Based on the arcade version of Salamander, changes on this port include starting from a pre-defined checkpoint upon death in 1 Player mode, faster enemy animations, and improved music.

name: Nemesis
description: This version changed similar to the Famicom version but adds its slew of exclusive content to make up for the downgrade. A new stage, the bone planet was added between the Inverted Volcano stage and the Antennoid stage, featuring exclusive enemy types. There also four hidden warp zones and the...

name: 4xM
description: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U meets Melee. 4xM brings the Melee with overhauled gameplay, UI, and additional costumes.

name: Whoa Dave!
description: Whoa Dave! is an arcade action game. The action is single screen and the goal is a high score which is increased by collecting coins dropped by defeated enemies. Enemies that make it to the bottom of the stage bounce up from the lava and evolve.

name: Genghis Khan II: Clan of the Gray Wolf
description: Genghis Khan II: Clan of the Gray Wolf is a 2D turn-based grand strategy game, based on the life of the historical Mongol leader Temujin, better known as Genghis Khan.

name: Front Line
description: You're a lone infantryman on a perilous mission behind enemy lines! The battleground changes constantly as you advance. You'll fight every step of the way through all kinds of treacherous terrain... open roadway, dense underbrush and a danger-laden desert. Do you have the strategy, skill and...

name: Silver Falls: White Inside Its Umbra
description: The final game released for the Wii U, the game follows of a citizen of Silver Falls as they explore a dark forest in the outskirts of the town. While the Wii remote controls the character's flashlight, the GamePad acts as a pseudo-smartphone, allowing the player to control other elements.

name: Epic Donald
description: A follow up to the Epic Mickey series which would have featured Donald Duck and elements from the Carl Barks comics. The game was cancelled after the dismal failure of Epic Mickey 2 and the switch to focus on the mobile gaming market.

name: Bayonetta
genre: Shooter, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
description:
The port to Nintendo consoles adds Nintendo themed costumes and touch controls.

Wreak havoc as the foxy witch Bayonetta.

Bayonetta is a butt-kicking, havoc-wreaking witch, and she’ll shoot, whip, slice, and burn angels as she uncovers the truth about her own past. Her weapons and moves are all...

name: TwinBee
description: A port of TwinBee for Famicom and Famicom Disk System.

name: TwinBee
description: A port of TwinBee for MSX.

name: Makaimura
description: The Famicom version was released on June 13, 1986, and was the first Famicom game to utilize a 128 KB cartridge.

name: Tecmo Bowl
description: The newer re-releases of the NES version of Tecmo Bowl doesn't have the NFL Players Association license, so it the intro removed and changes to the roster. It is based on the Famicom version of the game.

name: Solomon's Key
description: The NES port of Solomon's Key, a puzzle game developed by Tecmo in 1986 for arcade on custom hardware based on the Z80 chipset. The game is generally recognized as one of the most difficult games to appear on the NES. The player, controlling a sorcerer known only as Dana must overcome unlimited...

name: Spelunker
description: A miner has to find the exit to a world of wonders that is deep in the ground. During his journey he has to collect bombs to destroy rocks in his way, collect keys to open doors and pick up little potions that refresh his timer. Treasure chests can be opened for bonus items.

name: Sky Kid
description:
The NES Port of Sky Kid.
You are the legendary Red Baron, flying a plane through a horizontal side-scrolling scenery set during World War I. To complete a mission, you simply need to get to the landing spot on the other side without being shot down, but you can gain extra points by destroying enemy...

name: City Connection
description: The NES port of City Connection, a 1-2 player comedic racing adventure platform game in which you control a car that can never be stopped. The object of the game is to drive through a series of cities and paint every part of the roads in each city as proof of your visit to that city. City...

name: Xevious: The Avenger
description: The NES port of Xevious.

name: Hebereke
description: Hebereke is a side-scrolling platform game set in a free-roaming environment. The game's world comprises interconnected areas which consist of outdoor sections, caves, water, and other thematic places with platform structures and wandering enemies.

name: Assassin's Creed III: Tyranny of King Washington - The Betrayal
description: The Tyranny of King Washington: The Betrayal is the second of three downloadable content packs in The Tyranny of King Washington. The episode begins with Ratonhnhaké:ton arriving in the city of Boston as a prisoner of General Israel Putnam.

name: Assassin's Creed III: Tyranny of King Washington - The Redemption
description: The Tyranny of King Washington: The Redemption is the third of three downloadable content packs in The Tyranny of King Washington.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
description: Battle or diplomacy? Swords or sanctions? As the ruler of a warring state in the turbulent feudal period of Japanese history, your decisions will sway the course of a nation.

name: Super Mario 64 EX Alo
description: A fork of SM64EX with extra features. It also includes support for other platforms.

name: Aruku Rush
description: Aruku Rush is a game created by Team Y of the Nintendo Game Seminar in 2014. Players control a dinosaur skeleton by moving its legs individually and maintaining its balance.

name: Jikansa Tansa
description: Jikansa Tansa is a video game developed by Team X of the 2014 Nintendo Game Seminar. The gameplay consists of maneuvering a penguin through a series of levels by estimating the path it must travel.

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Super Mario Maker
description: A downloadable stage for Super Smash Bros. for Wii U based on Super Mario Maker.

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Peach's Castle
Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Pirate Ship
Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Dream Land
Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Hyrule Castle

description: Has your Mii always dreamed of being king of the Kremlings from the Donkey Kong series? Sure they have - now they can realise their true destiny with this King K. Rool costume!

name: Skylanders: Imaginators

description: The 16-bit conversion of Super Street Fighter II, while featuring graphical and sound concession compared to the arcade version, features game-play largely the same as the original, including the new game-play modes, and selectable game speed brought over from Turbo.

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Ashley Hat + Ashley Outfit
description:
The Ashley Set from WarioWare is now available!
Dress up just like her with her pigtails and red dress! Maybe you can become cute like her too!

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Geno Hat + Geno Outfit
description: There aren't any Star Pieces to collect here, but you can make an epic journey of your very own with Geno's costume from the Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars game!

description: F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu was compatible with the e-Reader, with some of its content depending of the cards to be unlocked. Later versions of the game had some of the content added as unlockables in other ways, but some of the data, like the stages and staff ghosts, weren't included.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD Randomizer
description: Randomizer mod for the Wii U remaster of Wind Waker by SuperDude88.

name: Bayonetta + Bayonetta 2: Special Edition

name: Tokyo Millennium Collaboration
description: Also known as "Fashion Show Set", this DLC pack offer some costumes for the female characters.

name: Atlus Collaboration Costume Set

description: A set of additional Idolasphere worlds where to gain experience, gather items and train units. The pack contains the Mirage Hunter Idolasphere, the Mirage Hunter Idolasphere and the Mirage Hunter (Savage Festival) Idolasphere.

description: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV Wall of Fire is a gripping strategy simulation set in ancient China. Devise strategies against foreign rulers and take control of their cities to grow your own empire.

The Virtual Console version of the game lets you obtain one copy each of BattleChips #251-260 (the multiplayer only reward chips) in * code, GateSP in G code, and the Gospel chips in X code via the Network menu.
Due to them distributing the multiplayer chips, Hard Mode can be unlocked.

name: Mega Man Battle Network 3 White

name: Mega Man Battle Network 3 Blue
description: Join the heroic Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE for a further adventure in cyberspace.

description:
In the Virtual Console version, the Network Menu now lets you obtain one copy each of all secret chips including Otenko and GunDelEX. LeadersRaid and ChaosLord event chips are nowhere to be seen.
BassCross MegaMan Patch Card is distributed alongside the chips. Although the form is installed, the MB...

description: In the Virtual Console version, the Network Menu now lets you obtain one copy each of all secret chips (opposite version Navi chips). Furthermore, since the Event BBS cards, which are implemented by default in the international GBA version, were added to the Japanese version via the Network Menu.

description: In the Virtual Console version, the Network Menu now lets you obtain one copy each of all secret chips (opposite version Navi chips). Furthermore, since the Event BBS cards, which are implemented by default in the international GBA version, were added to the Japanese version via the Network Menu.

Select the camera on your gamepad and watch on your TV screen if...

name: FNaF 2: Wii U Edition
description: Your new job: survive five nights at the new Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Thought you'd be safe behind two flimsy doors? Think again. No doors, no security—just a Freddy mask to protect you. And hiding behind the monitor won't help; they're smarter than you think.

name: Ben 10 Destroy All Aliens
description: A 3D game based on Ben 10: Destroy All Aliens. It is a video game.
